findings.title: Accommodation of Non-ERC20-Compliant Tokens
findings.description: The finding highlights potential issues with tokens that do not strictly follow the ERC-20 specification or have additional functionalities beyond the specification, which can lead to unexpected behavior when interacting with these tokens.

findings.title: Suggested Event Generations on Setting Changes
findings.description: Lack of emitting important events that reflect important state changes when system-wide parameters or settings are being changed.

findings.title: Incorrect Length Enforcement in _createStreamMultiple()
findings.description: The `_createStreamMultiple()` function has incomplete input validation, specifically comparing `assetLen` with itself, which always yields true.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: The `owner` account has privileged operations in the `Stackit` protocol, including setting parameters and treasury adjustment, which can lead to security issues.

findings.title: Inconsistent Reentrancy Enforcement in Stackit
findings.description: The `StackitV3` contract does not consistently enforce re-entrancy avoidance, with some functions lacking the `nonReentrant` modifier.
